sentences.en: A merry companion is a waggon in the way.
sentences.cn: 旅伴爱笑闹,不觉路途遥.

sentences.en: He was harnessed to the waggon of beehives in the place of Prince, and the load taken on towards Casterbridge.
sentences.cn: 他把那匹小马套上拉蜂箱的马车，代替了王子的位置，往卡斯特桥方向驶去了。

sentences.en: Of course, the chuck waggon went too.
sentences.cn: 当然, 牛颈肉无盖货车也是去了.

sentences.en: On this the people stood asunder, and made a way for the waggon.
sentences.cn: 然后,站立的人群分开, 给马车让出一条道路.

sentences.en: Someone jumped out from the foremost waggon and cried aloud.
sentences.cn: 有人从最前面的一辆大车里跳下来,大声叫嚷.

sentences.en: Someone jumped out from the foremost waggon.
sentences.cn: 有人从最前面的一辆马车里跳下来。

sentences.en: The enemy attacked our waggon train.
sentences.cn: 敌人袭击了我们的运货马车队。

sentences.en: The lantern hanging at her waggon had gone out.
sentences.cn: 她车上挂的那个灯笼已经灭了.

sentences.en: The oan agged man drags a _ waggon of rag fragments.
sentences.cn: 那个衣衫褴褛的?拉着一货车破布碎片.

sentences.en: The ragged man drags a waggon of rag fragments.
sentences.cn: 那个衣衫褴褛的人拉着一货车破布碎片.

sentences.en: The rickety little waggon was already laden.
sentences.cn: 那辆摇摇晃晃的货车,已经装好了车子.

sentences.en: The waggon must go whither the horses draw it.
sentences.cn: 谚---马拉到哪里,车就跟到哪里;胳膊扭不过大腿.

sentences.en: The waggon must whither the horses draw it.
sentences.cn: 马拉到哪里,车就跟到哪里;胳膊扭不过大腿.

sentences.en: The waggon's paint was badly chipped on the outside.
They mounted in front of the waggon, and Abraham grew reflective.
sentences.cn: 他们上了车，坐在马车的前面，亚伯拉罕开始沉思起来。

sentences.en: We rode in the farm waggon to the town.
sentences.cn: 我们乘坐农场的货车进城.

sentences.en: When the waggon had passed on, Gabriel withdrew from his point of espial.
sentences.cn: 当马车继续前进的时候, 加布里埃尔也离开了他窥探的地点.

trans.tran_cn: 四轮的运货马车，<英>铁路货车，<美>小手推车
trans.tran_en: (wagon)a strong vehicle with four wheels, used for carrying heavy loads and usually pulled by horses
